name: The Messenger Assist
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

Board the starship Messenger as a manifestation of the ship's computer, and keep your pilot alive long enough to escape. The game is over after you go to warp and the console reads "Mission Complete" - however, you can continue to tinker with the ship afterwards as long as you like.

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look around (mouse sensitivity can be changed in the pause menu)
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Escape - Pause

Code/Art by @graebor
Sound by @julianbeutel
Voice by Lauren Marshall

If you are a Ludum Dare participant, please give this game a rating on the Ludum Dare submission page!

Update: We did a small bugfix update at 9pm on April 20th to add a more precise option for mouse sensitivity - for some players the mouse was super sensitive when using vsync, so you can now turn the speed all the way down to 1%.
